1296890.name: Population Zero - Sentinel DLC Pack
1296890.description:
Sentinels. The colony's Guardians. They were trained to become the first trailblazers in the alien world of Kepler. They are here to build defenses and protect fellow colonists from all the dangers of the unknown planet. Sentinels are among the few, but they are the elite of this mission.

Their unique experience and knowledge gained through extreme, exhaustive training and survival simulations make them the most capable fighters and scouts on Kepler.



The set includes:

  • Exclusive Sentinel's Recon Troop Helmet
  • Exclusive Sentinel's Titanium Alloy Glaive
  • Exclusive Sentinel Banner

  • Medium Survival Pack
  • Medium Resource Pack
  • Extended Backpack with +5kg carry capacity

  • Digital Artbook (coming soon)
  • Content Creator Pack
1296890.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 俄语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
